quotes.quote: Everything should be made as simple as possible, but not one bit simpler.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: It is simplicity that makes the uneducated more effective than the educated when addressing popular audiences.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams! Live the life you've imagined. As you simplify your life, the laws of the universe will be simpler.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Simplicity is the peak of civilization.
quotes.author: Jessie Sampter

quotes.quote: Nothing is as simple as we hope it will be.
quotes.author: Jim Horning

quotes.quote:
Manifest plainness,
Embrace simplicity,
Reduce selfishness,
Have few desires.
quotes.author: Lao-tzu

quotes.quote: I adore simple pleasures. They are the last refuge of the complex.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde
